summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet and inmate roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 9-10, 2019. It records inmate counts by housing unit and lists specific inmates assigned to hospital detail, providing a snapshot of the facility's population shortly before Jeffrey Epstein's death.

persons.name: Bullock
persons.context: Listed as an inmate with registration number 86409-054 assigned to hospital detail on August 9, 2019.

events.title: Inmate Hospital Assignments
events.description: Four inmates (Bullock, Decapua, Gama-Pineda, Mcduppie) were assigned to hospital detail at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Official Prison Count
events.description: An official inmate count was conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, recording a total census of 758 inmates across various housing units.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is dated August 9-10, 2019, which is the weekend immediately preceding Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
The Metropolitan Correctional Center's total inmate census was recorded as 758 individuals.
Four specific inmates (Bullock, Decapua, Gama-Pineda, Mcduppie) were assigned to hospital detail on August 9, 2019.
The document shows standard prison administrative procedures including unit counts and assignment rosters.
Multiple housing units are listed including B-A, C-A, E-N, E-S, G-N, G-S, H-A, I-N, K-N, K-S, R-A, Z-A, and Z-B.
